mp3player.desktopaudio

Class AudioDataFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • mp3player.desktopaudio.AudioDataFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AudioDataFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    AudioDataFormat contains information about the format of decoded audio data.

    It's equivalent in the Java Sound API is AudioFormat.

    Author:
    Philipp Holl
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equalFormat

        public boolean equalFormat(AudioDataFormat other)
        This method does not compare the properties and not the encodingClassName.
        Parameters:
        other - a format to compare this one to
        Returns:
        true if the formats are equal in terms of audio data format

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
